description:
To do Druj a favor, the great Jahy agrees to give a speech.
This is a good opportunity to make the extent of her power known, but Druj ruins it by stealing the show again and again.
After that, Jahy is invited to a party and overjoyed as she relives the lavish excesses from the Dark Realm.
However, once it`s over, she is taken over by loneliness and pain.
Jahy renews her vows to restore the Dark Realm.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La grande Jahy ne prend pas de bain !
ジャヒー様はお風呂に入れない!
